description:
Features:Fit for: iPad, Notebook which has bluetoothBluetooth: A cable-free connectionSlim: Its compact design is great for travelsOn/Off switch: "CONNECT" buttonWireless Distance: 0-10m; Version: V2.0Power supply: Use 2 AAA(Here is not included)Product dimensions: 285*120*16 mmWeight: 310gSupport:Bluetooth 3.0 or above requirediPad Air, iPad mini with Retina Display,iPad Mini, iPhone 5S 5C 5 4S 4, iPod TouchSmartphones with Android 3.0 and above
(This keyboard may have compatibility issues with Android 4.3 and 4.4.)Bluetooth-enabled PCs or Laptops with Windows XP Vista 7 8Bluetooth-enabled iMac / Macbooks with Mac OS X 10.2.8 or above (note that some exceptions may apply: we guarantee hassle-free support and easy returns/exchanges)Windows Mobile 5.0 and aboveNot compatible MAC MINI or Moto RAZRPackage:1 x EC TECH keyboard1 x User Manual
title: EC TECHNOLOGY® Ultra Slim Mini Bluetooth 3.0 Wireless Keyboard For iPad Mini 2 iPad Air iPad Mini iPad, Samsung Galaxy Tab, New Google Nexus 7 FHD And Other Tablets With Android 3.0 Above- White Color
